00032 {
00033 public:
00035     CO_API BufferConnection();
00036

00039 
00044     CO_API void sendBuffer( ConnectionPtr connection );
00045

00048

00051

00054

00058     void readNB( void*, const uint64_t ) override { LBDONTCALL; }

00060         { LBDONTCALL; return -1; }
00061     CO_API int64_t write( const void* buffer,
00062                                   const uint64_t bytes) override;
00063
